ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I am a type of mollusk.
🥗 I am sometimes found in soups and salads.

ocean.question: I'm a big, gray mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I'm much larger than a human.
📢 I use sound to communicate.
💧 I breathe air, even though I live in the water.

ocean.question: I am a very colorful fish with many shapes of colors. I live in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I like to hide in small spaces.
🌈 I am fun to watch swimming around.
👑 Some people think I'm royalty.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze into very small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🧠 I am very smart.
🖐️ My arms have suckers.

ocean.question: I’m a long, thin fish that looks like a snake, and I sometimes hide in rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I swim with a wavy motion.
🐍 I have no scales.
⚡ I can be electric.

ocean.question: I am a floating mass of ice, broken off from a glacier. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very, very cold.
🚢 Ships need to avoid me.
🏔️ I was once part of a very large land formation.

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that lays camouflaged on the seafloor. I have both of my eyes on one side of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ My eyes are strangely positioned.
🎨 My skin helps me blend in.
🥞 I am named after a shape.

ocean.question: I am a current that moves warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to the Atlantic Ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I regulate temperatures.
➡️ I am a strong flow of water.
🇲🇽 My name starts with the body of water near Mexico.

ocean.question: I am a deep, underwater canyon. I often have steep sides. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I am like a valley, but under the sea.
🐟 Sea creatures can hide inside me.
🌊 I may have been carved by an underwater river.

ocean.question: I am the measure of dissolved salt in water. The ocean has a lot of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 I make the ocean taste different from a lake.
🌊 I vary in different parts of the ocean.
👨‍🔬 Scientists use a special tool to measure me.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I don't need a track. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I often carry families.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
🛣️ I travel on roads.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, but I'm not a bird. I take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings but can't flap them.
☁️ I travel through clouds.
🌎 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I travel on water, carrying people or goods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
🚢 I might have a captain.
⚓ I use an anchor to stay still.

transport.question: I run on tracks, picking up people on the way. I am much longer than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path.
📢 I often have an announcer.
⏱️ I run on a schedule.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals, and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪖 You might wear a helmet when using me.
🦶 You use your legs to make me go.
🔔 Some have a bell to warn people.

transport.question: I can fly straight up, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
⚕️ Sometimes I'm used for medical emergencies.
🚨 I can be very loud.

transport.question: I travel underground, carrying many people through tunnels in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I am also called the 'tube' in some cities.
🔦 It's dark where I travel.
🗺️ You need a map to use me efficiently.

transport.question: I'm a large vehicle that carries goods. You'll see me often on a highway. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver things.
🚚 I have many wheels.
🛣️ I am often seen on long journeys.

transport.question: I'm a type of boat that can go underwater. What am I?

hints.text: 🤿 I explore the deep ocean.
⚙️ I have special technology to survive underwater.
🌊 I can be used for research or military purposes.

transport.question: I travel to space, going further than any airplane. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me.
🌌 I explore other planets.
